title: The Sunny Room
provenance:
Edouard Vuillard [1868-1940], Paris, France. [1] (Sam Salz, Inc., New York, New York); Putnam Dana McMillan [d. 1961], Minneapolis, Minnesota on December 19, 1957; bequest to MIA in 1961.

[1] A need remains to determine whether transfer to Salz was direct/method of acquisition. The work was exhibited twice (1922 and 1936) at the Galerie Bernheim-Jeune in Paris. Did the work still belong to Vuillard, or did the work belong (privately or part of their stock) to Bernheim-Jeune'
